title: Auth Test
subtitle: Use this page to validate Firebase Google login.
loginSubtitle: Continue as guest or log in with Google Account.

loginHighlights.syncDescription: Open your diary on any device and continue where you left off.
loginHighlights.privacyDescription: Entries stay connected to your account and are never public.
loginHighlights.guestDescription: Start as a guest now and connect Google later when you are ready.

mergeUnknownError: Could not merge guest entries into this account.
